description: Surface spray disinfectant - household grade. Kills 99.9% of Germs*. Great for food surfaces. No need to rinse. Non bleach.  Dettol has over 80 years of germ protection experience and we are passionate about helping to keep your family healthy. That?s why we make products that not only help to keep your home clean and fresh, they also help to protect your family from harmful germs that can cause illnessDettol Antibacterial Surface cleanser with Fresh Lime & Mint is a household grade disfinfectant, safe to use around your kitchen . - Kills 99.9% of germs*- Removes 90% of allergens**- Great for use on surfaces where food is prepared, stored and eaten- No need to rinse - Non bleach*Germs such as: Salmonella, E.coli, MRSA, Listeria, Campylobacter, Pseudomonas, Staphylococcus.**Allergens such as: Pollen Particles, Dust Mite Debris, Pet Dander #Children over 12 months.
name: Dettol Multipurpose Disinfectant Trigger Spray Lime And Mint 500ml
